title: I love the actor, Reese Witherspoon. If you do too, why? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, she's a fox. Second she is an artist, not with paint or brush, but with her portrayal of so many interpretations of people and situations that she created yet did not actually live through. She did this The same way painters do it. You take what is in your head and manifest it so others can see it, and experience it. And she is a fox.
Because she's as American as apple pie. There's just something sweet about her ;)
